pages.text: Roman-style throwable javelins. Hold right-click to charge, then release to throw. When thrown, spears deal AOE damage where they land.
A stronger variant crafted from diamond. Higher damage and durability than iron, but functions identically. Supports enchantments like Sharpness and Looting.
A soul-bound spear with two modes. $(bold)Deactivated:$() Behaves like a diamond spear. $(bold)Activated:$() Gains AOE melee attacks and sacrifices enemies to nearby Blood Altars.

pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 50 LP per attack/throw$(br)$(bold)Toggle:$() Sneak + Right-click$(br2)$(bold)Activated Features:$()$(li)AOE melee damage (5 block radius)$(li)Enemies near altar are sacrificed$(li)Instant kill + LP to altar$(li)Unbreakable, fireproof$(br2)$(italic)The ultimate weapon of blood magic.$()
